feed.title: Mark Houghton
feed.subtitle: Welcome! Feel free to explore, and contact me with any questions!

entry.title: Iterative methods
entry.content: I’d like to start building up a collection of notes for numerical methods. Specifically, a laymans guide to iterative methods that I can refer back to throughout my research.
entry.summary: I’d like to start building up a collection of notes for numerical methods. Specifically, a laymans guide to iterative methods that I can refer back to throughout my research.

entry.title: Welcome to my website!
entry.content:
I’m Mark, a 2nd year PhD student at the University of Leeds. I hope to use this site to share information about my skills, interests, and current research.

I may get around to discussing code snippets:

But that will depend how often I update this blog.

You can also find me on LinkedIn, and you’ll find my code on GitHub and GitLab, although at the time of writing these are all pretty bare and don’t represent anything I’ve been working in the last 2-3 years!
entry.summary: I’m Mark, a 2nd year PhD student at the University of Leeds. I hope to use this site to share information about my skills, interests, and current research.
